Private providerByLocationCache

providerByLocationCache: Map<string, PouchDbStorageProvider> = new Map()
  • Defined in src/runtime/storage/pouchdb/pouch-db-storage.ts:29

A map of the key location to the actual provider. Used for replication callbacks and as a short-circuit for the connect method.

    • Defined in src/runtime/storage/pouchdb/pouch-db-storage.ts:230

Private isTypeReferenceMode

  • isTypeReferenceMode(type: Type): boolean
    • Defined in src/runtime/storage/pouchdb/pouch-db-storage.ts:65

    Determines if the given type is Reference Mode and sets it accordingly. Attempts to sidestep the hacky ways reference mode changes outside of the storage subsystem. The following items will force reference mode to false:

    • ArcType, used for serialization
    • EntityType used for Search/Suggestions
    • ReferenceTypes
    • TypeContainers that contain Reference Types.

    Parameters

    • type: Type

    Returns boolean

Private setupSync

  • setupSync(localDb: Database, remoteDb: Database): void
    • Defined in src/runtime/storage/pouchdb/pouch-db-storage.ts:283

    Starts syncing between the remote and local Pouch databases. Installs an event handler that propagates changes arriving from remote to local objects using matching location IDs.

    Parameters

    • localDb: Database
    • remoteDb: Database

    Returns void
